level.heading: Exemptions.
level.text: Unless the method of offer or disposition is adopted for the purpose of evasion of this chapter, the provisions of §§ 42-1904.02, 42-1904.03, 42-1904.04, 42-1904.05, 42-1904.06, 42-1904.07, 42-1904.08, 42-1904.09, and 42-1904.12 do not apply to:
Dispositions in a condominium in which all units are restricted to commercial, industrial, or other nonresidential use;
Dispositions by any government or government agency;
Solicitation and acquisition by the declarant of nonbinding reservation agreements;
Dispositions by foreclosure or deed in lieu of foreclosure.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 42-1901.01 and § 42-1904.11.
